title: Current champion sales not showing in client
body: The current champion sales, Vi for example. Are not showing up in the store as 50% off.

replies.body: The sale will be live at 5pm AEDT, in roughly 2 hours. Apologies for the confusion with this.
Ekko is still 7800 Ip after a week?
Is Ekko going to be reduced at this time aswell?
Thanks for bringing that up. Looking into it now, will edit this post when its fixed!
Ekko hasn't been reduced too btw.
